trans-unit.source: Converts rectangles from one data type to another.
trans-unit.target: 將矩形從某一資料型別轉換為另一資料型別。

trans-unit.source: Access this class through the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別可透過 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" /> 來存取。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleConverter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A formatter context.
trans-unit.target: 格式子 (Formatter) 內容。

trans-unit.source: This object can be used to get additional information about the environment this converter is being called from.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件可用來取得環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境呼叫的。

trans-unit.source: This may be <see langword="null" />, so you should always check.
trans-unit.target: 這可能是 <see langword="null" />，所以您要隨時檢查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object may also return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此外，內容物件上的屬性也可能會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type you want to convert from.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的來源型別。

trans-unit.source: Determines if this converter can convert an object in the given source type to the native type of the converter.
trans-unit.target: 判斷這個轉換子是否可以將指定來源型別中的物件轉換成轉換子的原生型別。

trans-unit.source: This method returns <see langword="true" /> if this object can perform the conversion; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個物件可以執行轉換，則這個方法會傳回 <see langword="true" />；否則傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: 提供格式內容的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This can be <see langword="null" />, so you should always check.
trans-unit.target: 這可能是 <see langword="null" />，所以您要隨時檢查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can also return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此外，內容物件上的屬性也可能會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that represents the type you want to convert to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件，表示要轉換成的型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object to the given destination type using the context.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示這個轉換子是否可以使用內容將物件轉換成指定的目的型別。

trans-unit.source: This method returns <see langword="true" /> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個轉換子可以執行轉換，則這個方法會傳回 <see langword="true" />；否則傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to get additional information about the environment this converter is being called from.
trans-unit.target: `context`參數可以用來取得這個轉換子就從呼叫的環境相關的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that can be used to get additional information about the environment this converter is being called from.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 可用來取得環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境呼叫的。

trans-unit.source: This may be <see langword="null" />, so you should always check.
trans-unit.target: 這可能是 <see langword="null" />，所以您要隨時檢查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object may also return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此外，內容物件上的屬性也可能會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> that contains culture specific information, such as the language, calendar, and cultural conventions associated with a specific culture.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />，包含文化特有的資訊，例如與特定文化相關的語言、日曆和文化習俗。

trans-unit.source: It is based on the RFC 1766 standard.
trans-unit.target: 以 RFC 1766 標準為基礎。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given object to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件轉換為 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The converted object.
trans-unit.target: 轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: The conversion cannot be completed.
trans-unit.target: 無法完成轉換作業。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that can be used to get additional information about the environment this converter is being called from.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 可用來取得環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境呼叫的。

trans-unit.source: This may be <see langword="null" />, so you should always check.
trans-unit.target: 這可能是 <see langword="null" />，所以您要隨時檢查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object may also return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此外，內容物件上的屬性也可能會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> that contains culture specific information, such as the language, calendar, and cultural conventions associated with a specific culture.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />，包含文化特有的資訊，例如與特定文化相關的語言、日曆和文化習俗。

trans-unit.source: It is based on the RFC 1766 standard.
trans-unit.target: 以 RFC 1766 標準為基礎。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: The type to convert the object to.
trans-unit.target: 要將物件轉換成的類型。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件轉換成指定的類型。

trans-unit.source: The converted object.
trans-unit.target: 轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: The most common types to convert are to and from a string object.
trans-unit.target: 最常用於轉換的型別為相互轉換字串物件。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation calls the object's <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method if the object is valid and if the destination type is string.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會呼叫物件的<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>方法的物件是否有效，而且如果目標類型是字串。

trans-unit.source: If this method cannot convert to the destination type, it throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個方法無法轉換成目的地類型，它會擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The conversion cannot be completed.
trans-unit.target: 無法完成轉換作業。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> through which additional context can be provided.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />，可透過它來提供其他內容。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of new property values.
trans-unit.target: 新屬性值的字典。

trans-unit.source: The dictionary contains a series of name-value pairs, one for each property returned from a call to the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.RectangleConverter.GetProperties(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Object,System.Attribute[])" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 字典包含一系列的名稱值配對，從 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.RectangleConverter.GetProperties(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Object,System.Attribute[])" /> 屬性的呼叫傳回的每個屬性都會有一個配對。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of this type given a set of property values for the object.
trans-unit.target: 建立為物件提供一組屬性值的這個物件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for objects that are immutable but still want to provide changeable properties.
trans-unit.target: 對於不變但是仍然要提供可變屬性的物件來說，這很有用。

trans-unit.source: The newly created object, or <see langword="null" /> if the object could not be created.
trans-unit.target: 新建立的物件，或 <see langword="null" /> (如果無法建立物件)。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A type descriptor through which additional context can be provided.
trans-unit.target: 可用來提供其他內容的型別描述項。

trans-unit.source: Determines if changing a value on this object should require a call to <see cref="M:System.Drawing.RectangleConverter.CreateInstance(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> to create a new value.
trans-unit.target: 判斷在這個物件上變更值是否需要呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.RectangleConverter.CreateInstance(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> 來建立新的值。

trans-unit.source: This method returns <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="M:System.Drawing.RectangleConverter.CreateInstance(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> should be called when a change is made to one or more properties of this object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在對這個物件的一或多個屬性進行變更時應該呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.RectangleConverter.CreateInstance(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Collections.IDictionary)" />，則這個方法會傳回 <see langword="true" />；否則傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> through which additional context can be provided.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />，可透過它來提供其他內容。

trans-unit.source: The value of the object to get the properties for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其取得屬性的物件的值。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> objects that describe the properties.
trans-unit.target: 描述屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the set of properties for this type.
trans-unit.target: 擷取這個型別的屬性集。

trans-unit.source: By default, a type does not return any properties.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設值，型別不傳回任何屬性。

trans-unit.source: The set of properties that should be exposed for this data type.
trans-unit.target: 應該公開給這個資料型別的屬性集。

trans-unit.source: If no properties should be exposed, this may return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有屬性應該公開，則會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation always returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設的實作 (Implementation) 一定會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A simple implementation of this method can just call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A> method for the correct data type.
trans-unit.target: 可以直接呼叫這個方法的簡單實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A>正確的資料類型的方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> through which additional context can be provided.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />，可透過它來提供其他內容。

trans-unit.source: Determines if this object supports properties.
trans-unit.target: 判斷這個物件是否支援屬性。

trans-unit.source: By default, this is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="M:System.Drawing.RectangleConverter.GetProperties(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Object,System.Attribute[])" /> should be called to find the properties of this object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.RectangleConverter.GetProperties(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Object,System.Attribute[])" /> 來尋找這個物件的屬性，則這個方法會傳回 <see langword="true" />；否則傳回 <see langword="false" />。
